subject: Simsonn VAM/VAM Pro (Plus X / Pro
description_text: I’m having difficulties getting the vibration to work within ETS 2 I get the vibration within Sim hub settings Ive  added the pedals and the game and it’s coming up with waiting for data to which I do not understand I run the game and it does not work. I tried searching for tutorials but not getting anywhere.

conversations.body_text:
On 28 Sep 2025, at 15:29, service@simsonn.com wrote:   
  ﻿ 
	
  
 Hi Geoffrey 
 We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created. A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).  To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit  https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/4219?follow=email  Thank you for your patience. 
 
 View ticket 
 
If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address bar: https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/4219?follow=email
 
 
 Regards, simsonn Support Team

Hi Geoffrey,    Please test it first in our software. Uninstall the old version from your computer and install the new 2.1.1 version from the link.  Click on Vibration Test in the software to confirm whether it works properly.     After that, close our software, open SimHub, and start the game through SimHub for testing.     https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mS9dS2GyzhRYo81BcmTIOXY1POa6RvST/view?usp=drive_link
The link you sent me for 2.1.1 does not work and cannot find it on your website
Hi Geoffrey,    We’re sorry, please use this link instead.     https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BAdSWa1bxmbPksj9Hlzuo8bl7_bM8ixr/view?usp=drivesdk

I’ve lost count how many times I formatted my PC over the last few days and still cannot get them to work within the game ETs 2 i’ve installed your latest software for Sim manager they vibrate when activated they also vibrate within sim hub not changed any settings with the vibration side of it. And they still do not work.

Hi Geoffrey,    Please send me the log folder from your SimHub installation directory as a package, and I will contact the SimHub team to investigate this issue. It seems to be an isolated case, as we have not encountered it in our testing environment. In the meantime, you can use our Simsonn Manager 2.1.1, which also supports telemetry.  https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BAdSWa1bxmbPksj9Hlzuo8bl7_bM8ixr/view?usp=drivesdk

How and where do I find the folder, please?

>
Hi Geoffrey,    You can right-click the SimHub icon and select Properties to locate the installation directory, then open the log folder inside it.

I don’t know if I’m looking in the right place


>

I’m just totally confused. I know nothing at all about computers.


>

Hi Geoffrey,  Please uninstall the old version on your computer, then reinstall version 2.1.2 and update the firmware. After the update, the device version should display as CPU1: 2.0.5, CPU2: 2.0.3. If the issue persists, please feel free to contact me. Also, I’ve already forwarded your log file to the SimHub team for further analysis.       https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PZwHUqhhmJw0IBGDO8mGONPbrICJU3z1/view?usp=drive_link

Because I’ve had so many problems and having to keep reformat in the PC it will not allow me to put activation key in the game to run it it says exceeded too many times


>

I think the issue is with Simsonn linear motor i’ve also downloaded ATS and connected all my controls up with no problems whatsoever as soon as I plug in the Sims pedals it messes the game up and cannot select any gears which does not allow me to drive i’ve just placed an order now for another power supply for the pedals i’ve only had these paddles for a very short time and not been able to use them looks like I’m gonna have to go back to the Logitech pedal.


>

Hi Geoffrey,     Please download the VKB JoyTester tool and check whether the RX axis is active. If the signal still appears unstable, please record a video and share it with me via Google Drive, making sure to grant access permission. Don’t worry — I’ll make sure we get this issue resolved for you.   https://www.vkbcontrollers.com/pages/downloads

Eventually got them to work in ETS and ATS Cannot drive as the brakes lock on When the pedals are activated I have no control to drive as soon as any paddle activates with vibration the truck stops and cannot move and I lose the air in the air compressor When the air tank buildup pressure, I go to pull away and the brakes lock on again?

>

Hi Geoffrey,    You can refer to the guide we shared: Replace the metal screws and washers with nylon ones to electrically isolate the motor from the pedal. This will help stabilize the brake signal.  If you don’t have nylon screws and washers, we can send you a free replacement set. Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and shipping address, and we’ll arrange the shipment as soon as possible.        https://www.reddit.com/r/simracing/comments/1n291hi/solution_for_simsonn_vam_pro_emi_issues/
Order number #ssn2511 Geoffrey Fishlock 5 St Andrews Close Kenn Exeter Devon. EX6 7UH 01392833997
Hi Geoffrey,    Here is your logistics tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045968301562
